source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Mastering Canvas Workspace
items.headline: Expand your creative adventures with the Brother Scan N Cut.
objectives_summary: Students will gain a deeper understanding of the installed edition of Canvas Workspace, the companion software for the Brother Scan N Cut.
Students will gain a deeper understanding of the online edition of Canvas Workspace, the companion software for the Brother Scan N Cut.
Students will gain a deeper understanding of the mobile edition of Canvas Workspace, the companion software for the Brother Scan N Cut.

items.title: Make a Fabulous Canvas - No Drawing required!

visible_instructors.title: Suzette Hussey
visible_instructors.name: Suzette
visible_instructors.job_title: Mixed Media Artist, Sculptor and Teacher

items.headline: Learn how to build up layers and add a photocopy transfer to create this beautiful OOAK Canvas
objectives_summary: You will learn how to make a fabulous mixed media canvas.
First you will learn the basics of mixed media layering techniques.
You will then learn how to transfer and image onto a canvas and add the finishing touches.

items.title: Painting Textures in Watercolor
items.headline: Simple ways to put texture into every painting.
objectives_summary: Paint many of the common textures we see around us, and also have a toolkit of ideas and methods of creating texture in watercolor.

items.title: Introduction To Clay Animation For Beginners
items.headline: Learn how to create stop motion animation at home with your smartphone!
objectives_summary: understand how to write a script and storyboard
know what things to consider when building a clay character
know how to create and find sound and audio for their animations

items.title: Drawing Human Actions to Master Figure Drawing and Painting

visible_instructors.title: Hobitute  Artists
visible_instructors.name: Hobitute
visible_instructors.job_title: Your art Guru, Artists at Hobitute

items.headline: Step-by-step approach to draw the Human Actions – Fundamental course for Figure drawing and painting
objectives_summary: The course has several lectures that are being taught by experienced artists who have taken pains to explain even the minute techniques, thus making it very easy for the learner to follow the concepts and practice.

The course provides the learners a good understanding of the structure of Human Actions or Poses and composition of the same for both the male and female body, which would help compose figure drawing and painting easily.
By completing all the levels under this course, the learners would understand the complexity of the subject and would learn the techniques of bringing energy and life to their drawings.

items.title: Become an instant magician with the best Simple Magic Tricks
items.headline: Magicians most guarded secrets are tricks which are EASY to master & get BIG reactions. Become an instant magician now!
objectives_summary: perform the best SIMPLE and AMAZING magic tricks
do magic with everyday objects
perform magic in different environments

items.title: Paint Realistic Watercolor and Botanicals - TOADSTOOLS

visible_instructors.title: Heidi Willis
visible_instructors.name: Heidi
visible_instructors.job_title: Renowned Watercolor Artist and Art Tutor

items.headline: Taking our painting practice into a fun new subject concretes and develops our learning and skills
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, you will have improved your knowledge, confidence and skills in watercolour painting
At the end of this course, you will have improved your knowledge, confidence and skills in botanical illustration
At the end of this course, you will have a greater familiarity and strategy of how to approach the magical Fly Agaric Toadstool as a painting

items.title: How To Draw Landscapes Vol 1 - English Country Scenes
items.headline: Learn How To Draw 5 Stunning English Landscapes with Colin Bradley. Follow Step by Step. Ideal for the Beginner.
objectives_summary: Use Pastel Pencil Techniques to draw detailed Landscapes
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Draw a variety of landscapes - sunsets, skies, foliage, water, buildings and more!

items.title: Modern Calligraphy: Flourish Confidently
items.headline: Modern calligraphy flourishes will soon be your best friend!
objectives_summary: Fundamentals of modern calligraphy flourishes
Discover key places to add flourishes
Practice 150+ flourishes

items.title: Acrylic Abstract Painting - Loosen Up
items.headline: Learn several ways to loosen up your acrylic abstract paintings
objectives_summary: Create acrylic abstract paintings in a very expressive, emotionally charged manner

items.title: Drawing Basics: How to Draw Like an Artist
items.headline: Learn how to draw anything as a beginner with the Drawing Basics course
objectives_summary: To draw like artists and enjoy drawing more
Breakdown any drawing project into simple steps
Draw anything you like, with the right proportions and dimensions

items.title: Sewing Leather Handbag:Become a Master in Making Leather Bag
items.headline: A Complete Course about Making Leather Bags, Zipped Pocket, Button Pocket and Handle Straps from Scratch, sewing handbag
objectives_summary: introducing the different kinds of leather
introducing the tools of leather work and how to use them
different kinds of stitches on leather

items.title: How To Draw Dogs Vol 1 - Pug, Collie, Labrador & Terrier
items.headline: Learn to draw a Pug, Collie, Black Lab and Terrier using Pastel Pencils with incredible results. 4 Subjects in 1 Bundle!
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw a variety of Dogs
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: 11 Step-By-Step Drawing & Painting Lessons for Beginners
items.headline: Art Program Designed for Beginners. Includes 11 Drawing, Acrylic and Watercolor Painting & Oil Pastel Projects. All Ages
objectives_summary: Create 11 Magnificent Works of Art!
Participate in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.

items.title: Crocheting for beginners with crochet projects
items.headline: From basics to the first project - Right handed version
objectives_summary: At the beginning of this course you can learn the basics of crocheting
The second section teaches you advanced crocheting techniques
By the end of this course you will be able to make some cool crocheting projects

items.title: How To Draw FACES for Kids

visible_instructors.title: Ed Foychuk
visible_instructors.name: Ed
visible_instructors.job_title: Illustrator and Instructor at How To Draw Comics . net

items.headline: Drawing made easy and fun
objectives_summary: Drawing basic shapes
Drawing faces
Changes facial proportions
